description.value:
Crude Bionic Arm with no hand and so cannot be used for fine manipulation or holding things. Instead has tool, such as buzz-saw, hammer, drill, shears, chainsaw, etc. acts as Melee Weapon doing 1d10+4 I/R, Pen 2, Tearing, Unbalanced.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
description.summary: Crude Bionic Arm with no hand and so cannot be used for fine manipulation or holding things. Instead has tool, such as buzz-saw, hammer, drill, shears, chainsaw, etc. acts as Melee Weapon doing 1d10+4

system.effect: Crude Bionic Arm with no hand and so cannot be used for fine manipulation or holding things. Instead has tool, such as buzz-saw, hammer, drill, shears, chainsaw, etc. acts as Melee Weapon doing 1d10+4 I/R, Pen 2, Tearing, Unbalanced.
